function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of resourcefulness in SMEs","Impact":"Inability to overcome quantitative and qualitative limitations, leading to decreased resilience and performance in turbulent times","Mitigation":"Invest in resourcefulness training and development programs, seek external partnerships to access necessary resources","Technologies":"Resource management software, collaboration platforms for external partnerships","People":"Small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs)","Owner":"SME owners and management"},{"Description":"Inadequate co-creation capabilities","Impact":"Inability to leverage customer relationships and adapt to changing environments, leading to limited strategic agility and potential disruptions","Mitigation":"Develop co-creation strategies, invest in customer relationship management, and enhance adaptability to changing environments","Technologies":"Customer relationship management software, data analytics for market insights","People":"Service firms, SMEs","Owner":"Business managers, marketing teams"},{"Description":"Disruptions caused by inadequate co-creation","Impact":"Disruptions in service ecosystems, negative consequences for organizations and individuals involved in co-creation","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous co-creation processes, establish clear communication channels, and enhance relationship management with co-creation partners","Technologies":"Collaboration tools, communication platforms, project management software","People":"Organizations and individuals involved in co-creation","Owner":"Co-creation managers, project managers"}]}
